        public String subscribeTopic(String topic,
                             String protocol,
                             String endpoint)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleNotificationService
        Generic version of subscribing to the topic.

        It is recommended to use one of the specialised methods instead.

        Specified by:
        subscribeTopic in interface SimpleNotificationService
        Parameters:
        topic - ARN of the topic
        protocol - see SubscribeRequest
        endpoint - see SubscribeRequest
        Returns:
        subscription ARN
        See Also:
